name: Bloody Night (TenNapy)
description:
Bloody Night

Have you ever felt like you suck at games? Well, then a game where you play as a vampire might be ideal for you. In this fast and quite stressfull game, your task is to feed the always starving vampire. Suck the blood of inmocent villagers, upgrade and teach new skills to your vampire, but be quick the night does not last forever. How many villagers will you get? How long will you survive? Let´s see, Vampire hungers.

This game was made during 3 days as a submission for Mini Jam 92: Death. I worked on this game solo, and i am pretty exhausted, also i got to go to school in 2 hours.

I will be glad for every comment and play - let me know about any bugs.. i am pretty sure you will find some :D
